text: But if ye have no uncles by the Father, the inheritance shall be given to them that are the next to kin, and this shall be to the children of Israel sacred by a perpetual law, as the Lord hath commanded Moses."

segments.text: But if ye have no uncles by the Father, the inheritance shall be given to them that are the next to kin,
and this shall be to the children of Israel sacred by a perpetual law, as the Lord hath commanded Moses."
